mapper.select: SELECT pt.type, p.price, p.account_no, p.bank, p.installment, ps.state FROM payment p, pay_type pt, pay_state ps WHERE order_id = #{value} AND pt.type_code = p.type_code AND ps.state_code = p.state_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (type, price, account_no, bank, installment, order_id, state) VALUES (#{type}, #{price}, #{accountNo}, #{bank}, #{installment}, #{orderId}, #{state})
